header: BRIEF-Trusona says Microsoft Ventures leads series B funding
body: * Trusona - announced it has raised $10 million in a series B funding round led by Microsoft Ventures joining current investor Kleiner Perkins Source text for Eikon:

header: BRIEF-Microsoft's board declares quarterly dividend of $0.39 per share
body: * Microsoft says its board of directors declared a quarterly dividend of $0.39 per share Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
